properties.comment: Properties common to all Jenkins jobs
properties.entry:
<description>
    <li>${jenkins.job.description}</li>
    <br>
    <li>${jenkins.project.groupId}:${jenkins.project.artifactId}:${jenkins.project.majorVersion}</li>
    <li>${jenkins.project.scm.url}</li>
    <br>
    <li>Job created by Maven Jenkins CLI Wrapper ${project.version} (Jenkins CLI Version ${jenkins.cli.version})</li>
    <li>Last config update via CLI - ${jenkins.build.timestamp}</li> 
  </description>
